revised_title: Polarization of Metallic Surfaces in Aqueous Solutions and a New Method of Obtaining Electricity from Mechanical Force
tldr: The authors investigate the polarization of metallic surfaces in aqueous solutions and develop a new method of obtaining electricity from mechanical force using mercury and platinum electrodes. They demonstrate that the polarization of mercury can be controlled and used to generate continuous electric currents, potentially providing insights into the source of force in batteries.
